body.name: SUPERJARE Triple 4 Tier Bookshelf, Bookcase with 11 Open Display Shelves, Wide Book Shelf Book Case for Home & Office, Rustic Brown
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 48 mins
features: 【MULTIPLE USE】With 11 open storage shelves, this ladder bookshelf can be used to store books, CDs, or display various decorations according to your preference. Not only just a book shelf, but also a perfect art decoration for your living room and office.

【ADJUSTABLE SHELVES】Considering the size of different items, the display shelves are designed to be adjustable, so you can adjust the bookcase shelf according to the size of the items you want to play.

【STABLE AND DURABLE】Crafted from steel frame and particle board, this wide bookshelf has high stability and long service life, each shelf can hold up to 70 lbs.The bookshelves come with anti-tilt brackets so you can fasten them to the wall for support.
【ADJUSTABLE FEET】8 plastic feet under the legs can be adjusted to accommodate the uneven floor and protect your floor from damage during movement.

【EASY TO ASSEMBLE】Product size: 63 x 10.2 x 54.6 inches. Package includes all installation tools and clear instruction manual, each component is labeled with a number, the book case is easy to put together within 1 hour.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shelf solution
reviews.reviewText: I needed more space for books and figurines I have been collecting. This looked like it was a good size and good price for what I wanted.The setup was fairly easy. I did it myself but 2 people could go a lot faster. It took me about an hour to get finished.You get all the tools you need but I do recommend a hex driver set if you have one to make things easier than the provided Allen wrenches. One of the sections seemed to be uneven but didn't notice it after I connected them. The crossbars are a bit easy to bend as well so be careful.The presentation looks nice and clean and it matches my other furniture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for Displaying Collectibles
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this to store my many gaming books, but I soon found the style and look of this shelving unit fit better to display my many collectibles. This shelf looks very nice in my gaming room and showcases my personal favorite toys. It is amazing how the look of this unit changes the whole room. Another feature I like is the ability to buy another unit and merge them into a larger bookcase.Putting together the bookcase was easy enough for me to do by myself. It is sturdy once assembled. It is not too heavy, but it is stable enough to hold books or fragile collectibles. I plan to buy a second bookshelf this spring.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful Shelving Unit!
reviews.reviewText: I use a bedroom as my walk in closet so, bought 1 of these to display handbags and shoes.Loved it and bought another!They look great, easy installation, very sturdy…I may need another too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy installation, looks great, good customer service
reviews.reviewText: The installation is easy, but if you have a small electric drill with hex bits, you can save a bunch of time and energy. Takes 10 minutes to put it together with the right tools.It's more substantial than the low price suggests, the box is quite heavy and the frame is sturdy. Comes with a wall anchor for stability.One of my frame parts were welded on the wrong side at the factory, so I reached out to the customer service email provided on an insert, not hoping much. However, they were super responsive and responded in one day, although there's a bit of lag in communication since they're based in China. Within 3 days of reaching out, the replacement part arrived from a regional warehouse so I didn't have to wait for anything to be shipped from China.Got it up and running and we couldn't be happier with the product itself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect display shelves
reviews.reviewText: We've had these for a few weeks now. We really like them. We're using them to display Legos and various projects we do with our kids. They were very easy to assemble. And they match our entertainment center perfectly. They were a little smaller than we thought they'd be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Assemble and Versatile!
reviews.reviewText: This Shelf was actually larger than I expected, which was a great suprise! Definitely felt like i got my monies worth that way. It comes with 11 shelves and you can configure them how ever you would like. We did ours to accomodate larger plants at the bottom sonwe have 2 left over shelves. But we loved how we had options and it doesnt affect the sturdiness of the product! Love it :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very high quality look and very easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: It probably took about 20 minutes to assemble, and it looks great. The wood panels are high quality and the frame has a quality brushed texture. I wish I got the taller ones though, which would make the whole assembly look even more impressive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As advertised: Big, easy, effective
reviews.reviewText: This is everything I had asked for. Building it was simple. There's room for all of my books and more. And it looks good.Compared to similar products, this bookshelf has metal beams staggered along the sides that make bookends less likely to be needed. That saved me money and headache! I still used a couple bookends, but only what I already had on hand for a couple under-filled shelves.If I had any complaint, it's that it looked shorter than I had hoped it would once installed. Fortunately, the artwork I put in the middle solved that problem. If you feel the same, you should try my solution. This is still a 5-star product, since it is the height I paid for.
I just love this bookcase, the open back gives it an airy feel and the cross bars that give it stability also look good and are a great feature
